text:
[Verse]
Streetlights flicker as we walk on by
Hands held tight beneath the night sky
Whispers echo secrets of the night
Dancing in the moonlight feels so right

[Verse 2]
Stars above tracing paths in blue
Soft wind blowing like it only knew
We sway along to the rhythmic tune
Hearts beating fast under silver moon

[Chorus]
Oh oh oh we just lose control
Feel the beat let it fill your soul
Oh oh oh never gonna stop
Dancing in the moonlight till we drop

[Verse 3]
Barefoot stepping on the city ground
Laughing echoes nobody around
Time slows down in this moment here
With every spin our worries disappear

[Bridge]
Neon glow paints the midnight air
In your eyes see the spark of a flare
Every move every twist and turn
Under stars we ignite and burn

[Chorus]
Oh oh oh we just lose control
Feel the beat let it fill your soul
Oh oh oh never gonna stop
Dancing in the moonlight till we drop
title: Dancing in the Moonlight
